children.name: p
children: : Services are the building blocks of modern microservice architectures - broadly a service groups together endpoints, queries, or jobs for the purposes of building your application.

children.name: p
children: : Resources represent a particular domain of a customer application - they are typically an instrumented web endpoint, database query, or background job.

children.name: p
children: : Required. A list of node selector terms. The terms are ORed.
